column3: Can trivially be bisected with `while ./test/functional/test_runner.py $(for i in {0..16}; do echo -n 'wallet_basic '; done) -j 16 -k ; do true; done`

IMO tests should be independent.\n\nHow about ensuring the test in L250 succeeds: generate a block and set `query_options.minimumAmount` in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/b1dc39df6ec878d06fc7217a3d7bf07397edf3ea/test/functional/wallet_basic.py#L242?
Still want to keep this change?
Reworked pull according to your suggestions.
